name: LADY
blurb: This is the first T37 built, and has been owned by Mr. Smith since the beginning. She has two firsts, one second and one third overall in BYC Mackinac races, plus a few season's championships and wonderful cruising. LADY has recently been refinished, including nine coats of Awlgrip.

name: DEBRA
blurb: This T37 completed a circumnavigation as TIGGER, with former owners Sharon & Dave Ragle. Read about the voyage in Sharon's book: "The Oceans Are Waiting - Around The World On The Yacht Tigger."
location: The boat is berthed in Pasadena, MD

name: SEA CHASE
blurb: SEA CHASE is one of the first of several boats, built as a "T38" racing version.
